travel_spots.name: Goa Beach

travel_spots.name: Manali Hill Station
travel_spots.description: Mountain hill station perfect for trekking, paragliding and scenic views

travel_spots.name: Kerala Backwaters
travel_spots.description: Serene backwaters with houseboats, coconut plantations and scenic beauty

travel_spots.name: Jaipur City Tour
travel_spots.description: Famous for Pink City architecture, City Palace, Hawa Mahal and historical monuments

travel_spots.description: High altitude adventure mountain destination with stunning Himalayan landscapes

travel_spots.name: Ooty Hill Station

travel_spots.name: Varanasi Spiritual
travel_spots.description: Sacred city with spiritual significance, ancient temples, ghats and cultural heritage

travel_spots.name: Mumbai Night Life
travel_spots.description: Vibrant city with nightlife, beaches, cultural attractions and modern restaurants

travel_spots.name: Shimla Snow Mountain
travel_spots.description: Snow-covered mountain hills perfect for winter sports, trekking and sightseeing

travel_spots.name: Rishikesh Yoga
travel_spots.description: Yoga and meditation hub with ashrams, river activities and spiritual retreats
